overview: Mike Pinette leads Appistry’s channel partnerships and strategic alliance efforts. Mike has over 25 years of industry experience as a business development and sales executive. Most recently, Mike spent four years at Zend Technologies, where he was responsible for strategic alliances and channel efforts as VP of business development. There he was focused on building sustainable and equitable relationships with IBM, Oracle, Microsoft, Adobe and other regional partners to extend and sustain the PHP applications ecosystem. Prior to joining Zend, Mike served as VP of business development and marketing for Infogain, and as senior director of business development at TIBCO Finance Technology (acquired by Reuters). In addition, Mike held executive positions at Digital Equipment Corporation, Informix, and Actional Corporation (acquired by Progress Software).
